### Function 5 description
This function will create a plot that displays the counts of unique amino acids in a given input sequence. The input only takes one parameter, which is the input sequence. It then finds all unique amino acids from the input sequence, and creates a list thereof. Then the occurency of each unique amino acid will be counted and stored. From this a plot is made, displaying the counts of each amino acid and the counts.
